      • addSong

                                java.lang.String releaseDate,
                                int minute,
                                int seconds,
                                int optionGenre,
                                int optionUser)
        Add a new song to the program.
        pre #1: The title is initializated (is not empty).
        pre #2: The artist name is initializated (is not empty).
        pre #3: The release date is initializated (is not empty).
        pre #4: The song minutes is initializated (is not null).
        pre #5: The song seconds is initializated (is not null).
        pre #6: The option about the genre chosen by user is initializated (is not null).
        pre #7: The option about the user chosen by user is initializated (is not null).
        post: Has added a new song.
        Parameters:
        title - The title the user wrote. title != null, title != " ".
        artistName - Song artist name. artistName != null, artistName != " ".
        releaseDate - Song release date. releaseDate != null, releaseDate != " ".
        minute - Song minutes length. minute != null, minute >= 0.
        seconds - Song seconds length. seconds != null, seconds >= 0.
        optionGenre - The genre user choice number. optionGenre != null, optionGenre >= 0.
        optionUser - The user choice number made by user. optionUser != null, optionUser >= 0.
        Returns:
        A string with the required message.

                                              int position2,

        Add a new restricted playlist to the program.
        pre #1: The name is initializated (is not empty).
        pre #2: The position 1 is initializated (is not null).
        pre #3: The position 2 is initializated (is not null).
        pre #4: The position 3 is initializated (is not null).
        pre #5: The position 4 is initializated (is not null).
        pre #6: The position 5 is initializated (is not null).
        post: Has added a new restricted playlist.
        Parameters:
        name - The playlist name. name != null, name != " ".
        position1 - The position 1 chosen by the user to be the first playlist owner. position1 != null, position1 >= 0.
        position2 - The position 2 chosen by the user to be the second playlist owner. position2 != null, position2 >= 0.
        position3 - The position 3 chosen by the user to be the third playlist owner. position3 != null, position3 >= 0.
        position4 - The position 4 chosen by the user to be the fourth playlist owner. position4 != null, position4 >= 0.
        position5 - The position 5 chosen by the user to be the fifth playlist owner. position5 != null, position5 >= 0.
        Returns:
        A string with the required message.

        pre #1: The store array is initialized (is not null).
